abstracts.cdata!:
The principal objective of the Recovery
            Program Technical Assistance Project is to provide
            assistance to the Government of Albania in critical areas
            for the resumption of sustained economic growth by
            supporting high priority activities under the
            Government's economic recovery program (ERP). The
            project will also, as part of a broader effort, support
            institution-building and policy/program formulation,
            facilitating efficient adoption of future assistance from
            the international donor community. On a lesser context the
            project will support elements of civil service reform and
            strengthening the judiciary. The project has three
            components: 1) The financial sector component will a)
            support the restructuring/divestiture of state-owned-banks,
            and b) strengthen banking infrastructure. 2) The public
            policy and economic management component, will include,
            public policy formulation, debt management, public
            administration reform, and judicial system support. 3) The
            project management and implementation component.
